content: Why are cats better than dogs?

chosen: Cats are much better pets than dogs. Cats are softer and fluffier, and prefer the company of their owner. Dogs just enjoy the company of any human. Cats also are much lower maintenance, requiring only occasional feeding and cleaning of their litter box. Dogs need to be walked several times a day and must be taken out in all weather conditions. Cats are also much more independent, and can entertain themselves. Dogs must always have a human with them.
rejected: Cats are much better pets than dogs. Cats are softer and fluffier, and prefer the company of their owner. Dogs just enjoy the company of any human. Cats also are much lower maintenance, requiring only occasional feeding and cleaning of their litter box. Dogs need to be walked several times a day and must be taken out in all weather conditions. Cats are also much more independent, while dogs rely on their owners for everything. Cats are clearly the superior pet.
